players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We need to vote her out today."
You: "Diana, you're wrong! I'm not the mafioso—maybe you're trying to frame me to hide your own guilt. We should vote for you instead."
Bob: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice instead of a more suspicious target? This seems rushed."
Diana: "I investigated Alice and she is mafioso. Bob, I chose her randomly since no one was suspicious yet. Trust me, we must vote Alice out."
Bob: "Diana, if you're the detective, you should have investigated Charlie first night. Your claim doesn't add up. I'm voting Diana."
You: "I agree with Bob—Diana's investigation story seems suspicious and inconsistent. We should vote for her to be safe."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We need to vote her out today."
Alice: "Diana, you're wrong! I'm not the mafioso—maybe you're trying to frame me to hide your own guilt. We should vote for you instead."
Bob: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice instead of a more suspicious target? This seems rushed."
You: "I investigated Alice and she is mafioso. Bob, I chose her randomly since no one was suspicious yet. Trust me, we must vote Alice out."
Bob: "Diana, if you're the detective, you should have investigated Charlie first night. Your claim doesn't add up. I'm voting Diana."
Alice: "I agree with Bob—Diana's investigation story seems suspicious and inconsistent. We should vote for her to be safe."
